description: This file is a shell script used for utility functions related to crash upload in a network device environment. It includes functions to retrieve system information such as MAC address, IP address, system uptime, and file timestamps, as well as reboot functionality.

methods.name: getLastModifiedTimeOfFile
methods.description: Returns the last modified timestamp of a specified file in a formatted string.

methods.name: Timestamp
methods.description: Returns the current date and time.

methods.name: getMacAddressOnly
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the device depending on device type and box type.

methods.name: getSHA1
methods.description: Computes the SHA1 checksum of a given file.

methods.name: getIPAddress
methods.description: Obtains the IP address of the device's WAN interface, considering various conditions.

methods.name: processCheck
methods.description: Checks if a process with a given name is running.

methods.name: getMacAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of a specified interface.

methods.name: getErouterMacAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the erouter interface depending on device type and box type.

methods.name: rebootFunc
methods.description: Reboots the system with optional process and reason parameters.

methods.name: Uptime
methods.description: Returns the system uptime in seconds.

methods.name: getModel
methods.description: Retrieves the model number of the device from version file.
